summary: Frank Wagner is sleeping next to his family. Their plans to move abroad lay on the kitchen table, when they suddenly hear someone trying to break into the apartment and five masked men are trying to enter.
cast: Jakob Eklund|Joel Kinnaman|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Mikael Tornving|Jens Hultén|Sergej Merkusjev|Meliz Karlge|Zeljko Santrac|Jessica Zandén|André Sjöberg|Mårten Svedberg|Alexander Karim|Marie Richardson|Thomas Nilsson|Helena Eliasson|Fredrik Dolk|Alexandra Zetterberg|Henrik Norlén|Christian Brandin|Anders Gustavsson|Isidor Alcaide Backlund|Hanna Alsterlund|Jonas Bane|Vide Hedendahl|Moses Hedendahl|Nicole Marouki|Loana Masic|Jonas Sjöqvist|Johan Karlberg|Rasmus Lindgren|Shebly Niavarani|Magnus Roosmann|Lars Väringer|Ashkan Ghods|Frederik Nilsson|Malin Morgan|Mohammed Assir|Jimi Jonsson|Carlos Fernando|Anders Granell|Jerker Fahlström|Sandro Skagerberg|Benjamin Ikhine Aagaga|Youssef Salama Zeki|Magnus Lund|Danial Lashede|Michael Sarian|Fredrik Blixt|Douglas Johansson|Freddy Ehrenholm|Milan Cvetanovic|Margareta Olsson|Anders Lönnbro|Jenny Rosengren|Elisabeth Falk|Fredrik Petersson|Tomas Glaving|Peter Rätz
title: Johan Falk: Kodnamn: Lisa
